channel.title: Simple server please
channel.description:
HI, Firstly sorry if this seems newby but i am a newb so im aloud to ask lol!
Can some1 make me a basic server with a few working skills, auto save, plenty of npc's, shops that actually sell things and working magic etc etc. And if anything needs adding i'll have to learn!
If you arent willing to make one for free i can pay a bit of cash in real runescape.
And if no-one decides to help me how long does it take a noob to make a decent server with all the basics? 3 days? 7 days?
Hey if this is the wrong place in the forums can a mod or someone move it please!

item.title: Simple server please
item.description:
@1337 wrote:

Scar is for autoing. You can make scripts for scar, you rune them in scar, and they will automatically click whereever you have told it to click (or do whatever you have told scar to do). Scar has nothing to do with servers, if you’re looking to create a server for mopar scape look HERE

and follow the instructions. It should take you 20 minutes MAX to start up a server.

Read full topic
